name: Mothers of Chronomancy
description: Hailing from the Dunes of Kathoon, the Mothers of Chronomancy are known for their belief and allegiance to the semi-sentient forest, Amoria Now almost finished uncovering the details about chronomancers and their magics from aeons past, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
